posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase a Mathewson Dark Cap American Beauty/Cycle/or EPDG in 4/10 condition and would consider a nice raw card in similiar.

I'm hoping to purchase or do a three way swap to get someone a card they are looking for in return for a card that i want or an out right purchase.

If you have or know anyone with this card please let me know.

Kevin
